projects.name: huntercbailey.dev
projects.description: This is the site you are currently viewing! I created this to be a digital resume and more about me, including things like favorite tech stacks a deeper dive into my skillsets, to talk about my book, and any articles I may end up writing. This will be my personal site so it may change frequently or not at all depending on how much I want to do with it.

projects.name: Enchanted Rose Innovations
projects.description: Enchanted Rose Innovations or ERI is the business name in which I manage and sell Acolyte under. This is also the business that manages some of my other projects such as Project Alchemist which is an add-on to Acolyte but also functions as a standalone application.

projects.name: un-Traditional Magick
projects.description: My first client in web development, they needed assistance in re-desiging their web presence after significant re-branding. They were the initial adopters of Acolyte, and were a great help in developing it into the platform it is today.

projects.name: Acolyte R.E.A.L.M.S
projects.description: This is what I lovingly call my life's work, or my Magnum Opus. It is a custom Remote Engagement and Learning Management System (R.E.A.L.M.S.) I designed from the ground up and created myself. un-Traditional Magick used version 4 before going on a hiatus, and I am currently working on version 5, which is set to release late 2024.

projects.name: Project Alchemist
projects.description: This is an add-on that I am developing for Acolyte that will use Python and C++. It is a Machine Learning add-on that analyzes data about the system and content and provides feedback to the administrators, and can be helpful in answering questions students may have.
